timeline.bodyText: Instead of separating these out, can we just upgrade netty as a whole to 46 instead of just netty codec?
timeline.author: aaronilovici

timeline.bodyText: If these are matchingnow (jackson and jackson databind) you should remove the comment and refactor all instances of jackson.databind.version -> jackson.version
timeline.author: aaronilovici
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -209,10 +209,10 @@
         <httpmime.version>${httpclient.version}</httpmime.version>
         <jai-imageio-core.version>1.3.1</jai-imageio-core.version>
         <JavaAPIforKml.version>2.2.1_CODICE_1</JavaAPIforKml.version>
-        <jackson.version>2.9.10</jackson.version>
+        <jackson.version>2.10.0</jackson.version>
         <!-- databind 2.9.10.1 fixes CVE-2019-16942, CVE-2019-16943, CVE-2019-17531.
         This separate version can be removed when jackson.version is upgraded to a version newer than 2.9.10. -->
-        <jackson.databind.version>2.9.10.1</jackson.databind.version>
+        <jackson.databind.version>2.10.0</jackson.databind.version>

timeline.bodyText:
You can remove this too. All dependencies should use ${jackson.version} or ${cxf.jackson.version}
In fact I don't think you have ${jackson.databind} defined anywhere.
timeline.author: aaronilovici

replies.bodyText:
Yeah that's the reason for the build failure ^
[2020-05-22T14:52:33.469Z] [ERROR] [ERROR] Some problems were encountered while processing the POMs:
[2020-05-22T14:52:33.469Z] [ERROR] 'dependencies.dependency.version' for com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-databind:jar must be a valid version but is '${jackson.databind}'. @ line 102, column 22
[2020-05-22T14:52:33.469Z] [ERROR] 'dependencies.dependency.version' for com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-databind:jar must be a valid version but is '${jackson.databind}'. @ line 373, column 22
[2020-05-22T14:52:33.469Z] [ERROR] 'dependencies.dependency.version' for com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-databind:jar must be a valid version but is '${jackson.databind}'. @ line 52, column 22
replies.author: aaronilovici
